title: Beverly Hills
name: Barney Greengrass
content: Perched atop the trendy Barney's New York, this isn't the average deli; here, the brisket sandwiches and bagels are served while surrounded by Hollywood agents and the well-heeled crowd who like to be seen as much as they like to eat tasty, deli-inspired food. Great view from the patio (perfect spot for a Sunday brunch) and the prices are relatively fair considering everything else at Barney's is very expensive.
